settings.content: The logo position influence the rest of header components.
Please choose the position for each device screen in part.
Depending on the option chosen, some positions might not be available for the rest of header's components.
The 'Left' & 'Right' positions are not available when the logo is centered. The 'Center' position will be used instead.
In mobile, the menu is displayed like a flyout when the menu icon is clicked.
The 'Main area - left side' position is not available when the logo is in the left side. The 'Top-Left' position will be used instead.
By default the language switcher is displayed on the same side like the currency selector.
The 'Main Area - Left' position is not available when the logo is in the left side. The 'Top area - left side' position will be used instead.

All links, except the email one, must begin with http://, https:// or //. The email must be your email address with no mailto: prefix. Leave the text box blank if you don't want to use the corresponding icon.

In order to enable the wishlist, make sure to ENABLE the [customer accounts](/admin/settings/checkout) & CREATE the wishlist page using the 'page.wishlist' template like in the following [example](https://help.shopify.com/assets/images/themes/alt-template-select.jpg) from [Alternate templates](https://help.shopify.com/themes/development/templates#alternate-templates).

settings.label: Enable the theme's built-in Wishlist plugin ?
settings.info: The wishlist items are saved for each customer account in part. Make sure you have the Customer Accounts enabled [here](/admin/settings/checkout).

settings.label: Enable Wishlist Sharing
settings.info: This option allows the customer to email his wishlist to other people.

settings.label: Wishlist Page
settings.info: Please select the wishlist page previously created using the 'page.wishlist' template.

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.content: For the moment, Shopify doesn't offer a multi-language solution, therefore you need to create multiple stores using the same theme with different language configuration.
'link' = the link to the other store
'state' = set it to 'active' for the current store
